body_html:
@mbz, uploading the full log to pastebin.com and paste the URL here is very helpful.

If you are using a 12G GPU, something is wrong with the memory limit BFC allocator sees:

I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/bfc_allocator.cc:698] Stats:
Limit: 503270604

It is only allowed 500M GPU memory. A few possibilities:

  1. It is currently running on a smaller GPU.
  2. The GPU config in the session only allows that amount of memory.

The full log is helpful in this case.
